channel.title: CVE Feed for LCDS - Leão Consultoria e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas Ltda ME -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LCDS - Leão Consultoria e Desenvolvimento de Sistemas Ltda ME -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-9414|2024-10-17T15:59:24.981Z -- lcds%20-%20le%C3%A3o%20consultoria%20e%20desenvolvimento%20de%20sistemas%20ltda%20me -- laquis%20scada
item.description: In LAquis SCADA version 4.7.1.511, a cross-site scripting vulnerability could allow an attacker to inject arbitrary code into a web page. This could allow an attacker to steal cookies, redirect users, or perform unauthorized actions.
